DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy disease management programme ( DMP ) old patient HF significant co-morbidity . METHODS : A multicenter randomize trial conduct 700 patient heart failure , age 75 year , admit acute-care unit Geriatrics Departments 8 hospital . Patients randomly allocate DMP conventional usual-care . Randomization stratify hospital perform concealment allocation list . The DMP conduct case manager , include three main component : 1. patient education improve disease ' knowledge self-care 2. monitor clinical status 3. therapeutic adherence . Main statistical analysis perform accord intention-to-treat principle , use Cox regression model examine association DMP hospital readmission , quality-of-life , mortality 12 month .
